title: Moores Creek National Battlefield: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       No Entrance Fees are required to visit Moores Creek National Battlefield. Guided tours, however, do require reservations.             Patriots Hall   Patriots Hall is an indoor/outdoor multi-purpose facility used by the community for various events, including, but not limited to, reunions, weddings, birthday parties, community events, educational programs, and ceremonies.  Patriots Hall is not heated nor cooled, so this is considered a seasonal usage facility.  The fee to rent Patriots Hall is typically $150, which includes a $50.00 non-refundable Application Fee + $100 per day Special Use Fee.  Additional fees may apply for after-hours usage or other circumstances which call for cost-recovery fees.   Reservations are required. An application may be downloaded and emailed to the Special Park Uses coordinator matthew_woods@nps.gov                            America the Beautiful Pass   America the Beautiful - National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass  Senior Pass (62 and older)- $10.00 cash or check Access Pass (disability)- Free Access Military Pass (Active duty and dependents)-Free with valid military ID Access Pass (valid for one year) - $80.00 cash or check Every Kid in a Park Pass (4th Graders) - Free (must download a paper copy from the official Government website www.everykidinapark.gov and then exchange here for a plastic pass)    http://store.usgs.gov/pass/index.html
